setting_icon.global_settings_description: In this mode you can configure global settings. If the symbol has different settings, the change will not affect it. Please know what you are doing when making adjustments.
setting_icon.candle_interval_description: Defines the candle interval to calculate the highest/lowest price.
setting_icon.candle_limit_description: Sets the candle limit to calculate the highest/lowest price.
setting_icon.trading_enabled_description: If enabled, the bot will buy the currency when it detects the buy signal. If disabled, the bot will not buy, but will keep monitoring. If the market is volatile, you can disable it.
setting_icon.trading_enabled_description_sell: If enabled, the bot will sell the currency when it detects the sell signal. If disabled, the bot will not sell.
setting_icon.trigger_percent_buy_description: Sets the percentage to activate the buy signal. Example: If set 1.01 and the lowest price is $100, then the bot will buy the currency when the current price reaches 1.01. You cannot set less than 1, as the price will never reach the value. Unless there is a very sharp drop.
setting_icon.trigger_percent_sell_description: Sets the percentage to activate the sell signal. Example: If set 1.06 the minimum profit will be 6%. If the last bought price is $100, the bot will sell the currency when the current price is $106.
setting_icon.stop_price_percent_description: Sets the percentage to calculate the stop price. Example: If set 1.01 and the current price is $100, the stop price will be $101 for the limit order.
setting_icon.limit_price_percent_description: Sets the percentage to calculate the limit price. Example: If you set 1,011 and the current price is $100, the limit price will be $101.10 for the limit order.
setting_icon.stop_price_percent_description_sell: Sets the percentage to calculate the stop price. Example: If set 0.99 and the current price is $106, the stop price will be $104.94 for the stop order.
setting_icon.limit_price_percent_description_sell: Sets the percentage to calculate the limit price. Example: If set 0.98 and the current price is $106, the limit price will be $103.88 for the limit order.
setting_icon.stop_loss_enabled_description: If enabled, the bot will sell the coin when it reaches the percentage set in stop-loss. You can enable this function to prevent bigger losses than expected.
setting_icon.max_loss_percent_description: Sets the maximum loss percentage of the stop-loss. Example: if set to 0.80, it means you will not lose more than 20% of the total invested amount. If you bought the coin at the price of $100, the last price long will be set to $100, and stop-loss to $80. If it hits $80, the bot will sell all available currency balance in a market order.
setting_icon.temporary_disable_buy_description: Defines how long to disable currency purchase in case of stop-loss activation. Example: If set 360, purchase will be disabled for 6 hours.
setting_icon.note_changes: Note that the changes will take effect on the next tick
setting_icon.warning_global_save: Warning: You are about to save the global adjustment
setting_icon.ask_all_or_global: Do you want to apply the settings to all symbols or just the global?
setting_icon.delete_symbol_setting: Do you want to delete the symbol settings?
setting_icon.choosed_all_symbols: If you apply to all and any symbol has different settings, it will be lost!
setting_icon.choosed_global: If you apply globally and any symbol has some different configuration, it will be set to custom!
setting_icon._description: In this window you can override the global settings for a specific symbol. Please know what you are doing. The settings applied here will only affect this symbol.

last_buy_price_remove_threshold_descript.1: Sets the limit for removing the last bid price on symbols ending with
last_buy_price_remove_threshold_descript.2: When the currency price drops below the limit, the bot will remove the last purchased price. If the bot has not sold the currency, you can manually add the last purchased price, but if it is below the limit, will be removed again.

setting_icon.placeholder_last_buy_remove_price_thresh: Set the threshold to remove the last buy price from
setting_icon.max_purchase_amount_symbol_description: Sets the maximum amount to buy. Example: If set to 100, when the bot receives the buy signal, it will buy $100 of the currency.
setting_icon.max_purchase_amount_description: Sets the maximum purchase amount on symbols ending with
setting_icon.placeholder_max_purchase_amount: Set the limit for the maximum purchase amount
setting_icon.placeholder_min_purchase_amount: Set the limit for the minimum purchase amount
setting_icon.sell_market_order_description: If your profit is above the sell trigger price and the trend starts to drop, the bot will sell with a market order to maximize profits.
setting_icon.stake_coins_description: If checked, the bot will sell a little less than it bought to accumulate coins. Example: If set to 0.5% profit the bot will only sell 99.5% of the amount it bought.
setting_icon.hard_sell_trigger_description: Sets the forced sell trigger price. Example: If set to 1.01 the bot will automatically sell when the profit reaches 1% even if the trend goes up.
setting_icon.use_husky_sell: Use Husky trend on sell signal
setting_icon.use_husky_buy_description: The bot will not process the purchase if the trend is down. It will only process when the trend is rising. The bot's timing is greatly improved with this function.
setting_icon.use_husky_buy: Use Husky trend in buy signal
setting_icon.use_husky_sell_description: The bot will not process the sell if the trend is going up. It will only process when the trend is going down. Its profits are usually higher than defined like this.
setting_icon.weight_green_candle_description: Weight of green candles for indicator calculation. Please don't leave this value higher than weight of red candles! Bot will lose buy function after a price drop.
setting_icon.weight_red_candle_description: Weight of red candles for indicator calculation. Please, this value must be greater than the weight of green candles!
setting_icon.grid_buy_strategy_activate_description: Will activate multiple purchase of the same currency. Use with care.
setting_icon.grid_buy_strategy_description: Enables the possibility of multiple purchases, always calculating the average price. Ex: If set 1%, the bot will buy the currency again if the difference between the last purchase price is greater than 1%.

bot_options.login_expire_time_description: Sets the time for the login to expire. Set 0 to never expire (NOT RECOMMENDED)

delete_all_description.1: This will delete all your cache and database data.
delete_all_description.2: Your settings will be like the first time you started the bot.
delete_all_description.3: If you have an open buy/sell order, this function will delete all data about it.
delete_all_description.4: Please do not use this function with open orders.

dust_transfer._description: You can convert amounts less than 0.003 BTC into BNB every 6 hours. It is not possible to convert currencies that are not listed here.
dust_transfer.no_asset_convert: There is no currency to convert.

_actions.action_buy_filled: Order executed successfully. Setting last purchase price.
_actions.action_sell_filled: Order executed successfully. Removing last purchase price.

action_sell_disabled.1: The current price has reached the price for activating the sell.
action_sell_disabled.2: However, the action is temporarily disabled by

action_sell_disabled_stop_loss.1: The current price has reached the stop-loss price.
action_sell_disabled_stop_loss.2: However, the action is temporarily disabled by

action_wait.1: The current price has reached the activation price.
action_wait.4: Set the last purchase price to start selling.

action_buy_disabled.1: The current price has reached the purchase activation price.
action_buy_disabled.2: However, the action is temporarily disabled by

_actions.action_buy: The current price has reached the price for activating the purchase. I will try to buy the currency.
_actions.action_sell: The current price has reached the price for activating the sell. I will sell the currency.
_actions.action_sell_stop_loss: The current price has reached the stop-loss price. I am selling the currency at market price.
_actions.sell_wait: The current price is less than the sell activation price. Waiting.

action_open_orders.1: There are open orders from the symbol
action_open_orders.2: I won't open a new one.

_actions.action_max_purchase_undefined: I don't have a maximum purchase amount. Please set one in the settings.

action_dont_place_order.1: I can't buy the currency because there isn't

action_dont_place_order_calc.1: I can't buy the coin as there isn't

action_trading_for_disabled.2: is disabled. I will not open an order.

_actions.action_api_exceed: The API limit has been reached. I will not act for now.
_actions.action_placed_new_order: I opened an order limit purchase.

action_order_minimum_qty.1: The quantity for the order is equal to or less than the smallest quantity -
action_order_minimum_qty.2: . I will not try to sell.

_actions.action_less_than_nominal: The current value is less than the minimum allowed value. I will not sell yet.
_actions.action_placed_new_sell_order: I opened a sell limit order.

action_unknown_order.2: I will not open a market sell order.

_actions.action_buy_disabled_after_buy: I disabled the actions after confirming the purchase order.
_actions.action_sell_disabled_after_sell: I disabled the actions after confirming the sell order.
_actions.action_buy_order_checking: The purchase order appears to have been placed. However, I cannot find it in the open orders. Wait until it appears.
_actions.action_buy_order_filled: The buy order was successfully executed. I set the last amount and the last buy price. Waiting for the sell signal.
_actions.action_sell_order_filled: The sell order was successfully executed. I removed the last amount and the last buy price.
_actions.action_sell_order_checking: The sell order appears to be placed. However, I cannot find it in the open orders. Wait until it appears.

action_cancel_success.2: was successfully canceled. If the order still appears, wait for it to disappear.

profit_loss_wrapper.profit_loss_description: This section shows approximately your profit/loss for the current list of symbols open for sell with the last defined buy price. The calculation is simply adding your profit/loss for each symbol. Note that it does not represent your trading history gains and losses.

_description.1: Are you sure you want to remove the symbol from the cache?
_description.2: Note that this will only erase cached values.
_description.3: If the symbol is still being monitored, it will appear again.

symbol_edit_last_buy_price.edit_last_buy: Edit last purchase price and amount of
symbol_edit_last_buy_price.edit_last_qty_bought_description: Set/Modify the last purchased amount. If you don't set it next to the last price, the bot will sell ALL the free amount of the currency, instead of just the last purchased amount.

edit_last_buy_description.1: Set/Modify the last purchase price of the symbol.
edit_last_buy_description.2: If the bot bought the currency, the price is automatically set.
edit_last_buy_description.3: If you bought manually directly from the broker, you can set the last buy price for the bot to sell at the defined profit.
edit_last_buy_description.4: When the last buy price is set, the bot will start monitoring the sell possibility.
edit_last_buy_description.5: If you want to remove the last purchase price, set 0.

_description.1: Are you sure you want to resume the symbol's action?
_description.2: If the market is volatile, the bot will buy it again if it receives the buy signal.

_description.1: In this window you can trade
_description.2: manually. If you already have the last purchased price, then the bot will calculate the average cost and recalculate the last purchased price.
_description.3: To make sure the last purchase price was successfully recorded, the bot will monitor the purchase order. This may increase API usage.

notify_order_success.3: . Placed successfully. If the order has not yet been executed, it should appear at some point.
notify_order_success.4: If you press the sell button 100% of your available balance, the bot will calculate the 0.1% commission.

_description.1: In this window you can trade all symbols manually. To simplify the process, only market order is supported.
_description.2: If you set 0 on the symbol, the bot will not place an order for the symbol. If you already have the last bid price, then the bot will calculate the average cost and will recalculate the last bid price.
_description.3: To make sure the last purchase price was successfully recorded, the bot will monitor the purchase order. This may increase API usage.

pass_screen.pass_from_env: Enter password set in your .env file

past_trades.remove_history_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the last transaction history?

common_strings.last_buy_price_remove_threshold: Threshold to remove last buy price

no_candle.1: I couldn't receive new candle from Binance Websocket since

send_message.default_warning: Sorry. I was unable to determine the action. Something is wrong.
